solution_line_template: They sell twice as much raspberry jelly as plum jelly, so they sold {raspberry_multiplier} * {plum_jelly_sold} = <<{raspberry_multiplier}*{plum_jelly_sold}={raspberry_jelly_sold}>>{raspberry_jelly_sold} jars of raspberry jelly today.

The raspberry jelly sells a third as much as the grape jelly, so they sold {raspberry_jelly_sold} * {grape_multiplier} = <<{raspberry_jelly_sold}*{grape_multiplier}={grape_jelly_sold}>>{grape_jelly_sold} jars of grape jelly today.

The grape jelly sells twice as much as the strawberry jelly, so they sold {grape_jelly_sold} / {strawberry_divisor} = <<{grape_jelly_sold}/{strawberry_divisor}={strawberry_jelly_sold}>>{strawberry_jelly_sold} jars of strawberry jelly today.
